2.0
Version 1.0 # Initial release Version 2.0
# Add screenshot\n # Add bluetooth toggle\n # Add split screen\n # Add Paytm QR scan for Indian users\n # [Root needed] Add NFC toggle\n # [Root needed] Add Data toggle\n # Add Preferences screen\n # Link added to help with translations\n # Turn off wakelock if manually screen is locked. Can be disabled from preference screen.\n # Update status when changed from long pressing the control\n
Phone settings
Brightness Screen brightness
Auto brightness Enabled Disabled
Flash torch Flash as torch
Total silence Disable all sound DND active!
Screen timeout
Rotation lock Lock orientation
Wake lock Keep screen awake
Media volume Music stream vol.
Alarm volume
Ringtone volume
Battery percentage Battery percentage, battery saver state Charging Discharging Battery saver

Screenshot
NFC Hold for options Please wait…
Data
Enter split screen Split screen
Bluetooth Toggle bluetooth. No root needed.
Muted
Generic control Generic control description
Modify system permission needed. Click \"Proceed\" to open settings and grant permission. Overlay permission needed. Click \"Proceed\" to grant permission to draw over other apps. Battery service may be inaccurate. Battery percentages, battery saver state, charging state shown by the control may not be correct for all devices from all manufacturers.\n\n This control cannot toggle battery savings mode. Please long press on it to open settings and toggle it.\n\n Click \"Proceed\" to enable this toggle. Proceed Your opinion is important If this app has helped you, please consider giving a rating and/or a review. Sure Thank you! Quick apps The apps listed below belong to the respective organizations/developers.\nThese apps maybe removed in future if requested by the app developers or Google.\n
Enable accessibility service. Without this permission, the app screen is blocked.\n\nClick \"Proceed\" to open settings and grant permission. Paytm app is not installed. Kindly install from Google Play Store.
Without this permission, cannot send request to system to capture screen. We can only request split screen with this permission. Root options Useful for people with rooted devices.\nIf you are NOT rooted, many of the below options can be long pressed in power menu for further options. Root not available or permission denied! You can long press the NFC control to open settings and manually toggle NFC. You can long press the Data control to open Data usage page and manually turn it on.
Permissions Can modify settings Can draw over apps Accessibility granted
About Contribute to translation App intro Rate app Changelog Contact on Telegram
Want to translate? The strings.xml file is available at:\nhttps://github.com/SayantanRC/translations\n Follow the README instructions to submit a translation.
Translators
Skip Finish Next Previous
Hello! This is a short tour on how to use this app! Click next to proceed. Or skip to close this tutorial. You can always watch this later.
Step 1: Select the controls In the main screen of the app, select the controls you need
Step 2: Add to power menu 1. Long press power button. If you have never added a control before, click the highlighted blue box area Then go to Step 4. If some controls are already present: 2. Click the 3 dot menu. 3. Click "Add controls"
Step 3: Add to power menu Click Other apps This screen will only appear if you already have added some controls to power menu before installing this app. Else proceed to next step.
Step 4: Enable controls 1. Click this app name 2. Check the boxes of the controls. 3. Finally, click Save.
Done! You can now go back to home screen. If you long press power menu, you should see the controls.
Made with Android Studio\ Version:
Preferences Brightness slider algorithm
Linear
Logarithmic
Screenshot delay (in milli-seconds) Split screen delay (in milli-seconds)
200
350

1500
Auto wakelock off Turn off wakelock if screen is manually turned off.
